title: Hypothetical Condition
content: If I [were|was] a bird, I would fly.
explanationZhTw: 假設語氣（虛擬語氣）使用 'were'。
explanationZhCn: 假设语气（虚拟语气）使用 'were'。

title: Hypothetical Wish
content: I wish I [were|was] in Hawaii right now.
explanationEnUs: Subjunctive used for wishes contrary to fact.
explanationZhTw: 與事實相反的願望使用虛擬語氣。
explanationZhCn: 与事实相反的愿望使用虚拟语气。

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: I suggest that he [go|goes] to the doctor.
explanationEnUs: Subjunctive uses base verb form after 'suggest'.

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: It is essential that she [be|is] present.

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: The doctor recommended that Tom [stop|stops] smoking.

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: I demand that you [leave|leaves] at once.

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: It is important that everyone [read|reads] the rules.
explanationZhTw: 原形 'read'（忽略單數主詞規則）。
explanationZhCn: 原形 'read'（忽略单数主语规则）。

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: It is crucial that the letter [arrive|arrives] tomorrow.

title: Hypothetical Wish
explanationEnUs: Use past tense form for present wish (subjunctive nature).
explanationZhTw: 現在的願望使用過去式（虛擬性質）。
explanationZhCn: 现在的愿望使用过去式（虚拟性质）。

title: Subjunctive Formula
content: [Come|Comes] what may, I will support you.
explanationZhTw: 固定用法，意指「無論發生什麼」。
explanationZhCn: 固定用法，意指「无论发生什么」。

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: I requested that she [not smoke|no smoke] here.
explanationZhTw: 否定虛擬語氣：'not' + 原形動詞。
explanationZhCn: 否定虚拟语气：'not' + 原形动词。

title: Hypothetical Condition
content: If need [be|is], I will work late.

title: Mandative Subjunctive
content: It is vital that he [listen|listens] carefully.
